Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: Considering to just export the {{defaults}} object and be done with it. Depends on what the outcome of the discussion in FAB-9521 is.

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: Abandoned. I will export the {{defaults}} object instead, so this is no longer a subtask of FAB-9558. See FAB-9619.
